com.amazon.speech.speechlet

Class SpeechletResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse

  • public class SpeechletResponse
extends Object
    The response to a Speechlet invocation. Defines text to speak to the user, content to display in the companion application, and whether or not the current Speechlet session should end.
    See Also:
    Speechlet.onLaunch(LaunchRequest, Session), Speechlet.onIntent(IntentRequest, Session)
